summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: I think it's a massive risk not to have Haaland because he's been on great form this summer.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: But I just can't see me using that other draft.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: I'm very certain that that's what I'm gonna do. So I do have... two drafts, the one that has Salah, which is the one that I'm currently on.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: But there's other options that can also be very good under Arnold slot from Darwin to Luis Diaz to Jones and Sobos, Lai and Elliott in midfield.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: I was thinking about Darwin and had Darwin in, but Darwin is a bit in and out. Really.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: ...I've had drafts of my team where I've had Subozli in there. I've got a draft that I've got Jota in instead I've got...

summary.speaker: Kelly Somers
summary.text: I would love to go for Jota. I've had some great times... not literally with Jota.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: ...after Salah, personally I would go for Elliott as the.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: I think Elliott, especially against Arsenal was outstanding.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: Yeah, I'd like to sit here, Kells, and say, oh yeah, you can definitely go with that. But in my view, I think he's one of the players that feels pretty key to have.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: ...I would say Watkins maybe, obviously.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: I have Isak and Watkins, so that's the one that I'm looking for.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: I would say Watkins maybe, obviously.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: ...I just think that, like, in my mind, I agree on all of those three being great picks.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: I think, it's just not like me going into the game and, you know, costing 4 million, I get that.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: Jean Philippe Mateta has been an absolute star for France in the quarterfinal and semi final.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: But I also think a shout out to Dean Henderson in Crystal Palace.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: ...I was just thinking that he's a really good player.

summary.speaker: Julien Laurens
summary.text: ...He's also quite old now and so there's a few, there's a pros and cons, no doubt.

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: ...he's had a fantastic preseason...

summary.speaker: Sam Bonfield
summary.text: He might have to go as part of my sacrifice to get Salah in.
